fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ambush a player, attacking them. (1 use)
- At any time during the game, instantly mark a player to avenge on.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once you die, you instantly attack the player you last marked for avenging, regarless of phase.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
